name: Ancient Egypt
description: A mighty civilization led by Pharaohs and protected by divine warriors, desert soldiers, and sacred relics.

pharaoh.name: Pharaoh
pharaoh.special: Strongest warrior; only defeated by the Assassin when attacked
pharaoh.description: Supreme ruler of Egypt, commands divine power.

vizier.name: Vizier
vizier.description: Royal advisor and second in command to the Pharaoh.

high_priest.name: High Priest
high_priest.special: Can bless nearby allies, granting protection from one attack.
high_priest.description: Keeper of sacred rituals and protector of the gods' favor.

chariot_commander.name: Chariot Commander
chariot_commander.description: Master of swift and deadly chariot assaults.

royal_guard.name: Royal Guard
royal_guard.description: Elite protectors sworn to defend the Pharaoh.

archer.name: Archer
archer.description: Expert ranged attacker, precise and swift.

spearman.name: Spearman
spearman.description: Trained infantry of the desert army.

tomb_raider.name: Tomb Raider
tomb_raider.special: Can disarm cursed relics (acts as Miner).
tomb_raider.description: Specialized in defusing ancient traps and relics.

scout_rider.name: Scout Rider
scout_rider.special: Can move multiple spaces in straight lines across the desert.

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.special: Can defeat the Pharaoh when attacking, weakest otherwise.
assassin.description: Silent killer serving the will of the gods.

sacred_relic.name: Sacred Relic
sacred_relic.description: A divine artifact — capturing it wins the war.

cursed_statue.name: Cursed Statue
cursed_statue.special: Destroys any attacking unit except Tomb Raiders.
cursed_statue.description: An immobile cursed guardian that destroys the unworthy.
